text: There is not much content here. We should experiment with exporting and importing TiddlyJson.
title: About

text:
Each project lists a number of other projects which contains libraries that are required for the current project to operate successfully. These dependency projects are listed in the [[project_Deps]] property of the projects home stack.

```
getprop project_Deps
   return "lcw_GIT,lcw_Graph,lcw_HTML5,lcw_P2P"
end project_Deps
```
title: Cascading Projects

text: We want to switch focus away from [[cascading projects]] towards minimal self-contained projects. Our model will be the creation of [[Module]]s which can be expressed in a single script only script as used by [[Script Widgets]].
